field.comment: Every time we "verify" a translation, we start a new entry with an incremented version for further manipulation.
field.name: version

field.comment: Whether or not this translation has been verified
field.name: verified

field.comment: When a translation is deprecated in favor of a new translation, we mark the date. This allows us to get translations "at a certain point in time";
field.name: deprecated

field.comment: A translation might be disabled WITHIN the active time range because for example a hotfix is available.
field.name: disabled

field.comment: The environment this was last modified in, it might indicate a hotfix
field.name: environmentId
